comments:
Just a small suggestion for cleaner logs, but tonight, using 0506 build, my 
trusty internet connection went down and I ended up getting a great many of the 
following excpetions in my log, one for each project, and since I have roughly 
50 projects loaded, it seemed to really clutter it up. I'm not sure if they 
should be "grouped" (e.g. according to host) or if simply made shorter so whole 
stack is not displayed. 

My concern is both that end users might become overly concerned if they say 
that, and it might make them miss more significant log events. 

Thanks.
